newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINNISH LABOUR MINISTRY TO END REINI'S CONTRACT.
newsitem.headline: FINNISH LABOUR MINISTRY TO END REINI'S CONTRACT.

text.p: The Ministry of Labour said on Monday it will take steps to terminate the contract of state labour mediator Jorma Reini.
"The Ministry of Labour will take the necessary actions to end Jorma Reini's employment relationship," the ministry said in a statement.
The Labour Ministry said in the statement that Reini was being charged with resisting arrest and assault.

"On the basis of the charge against Reini, Minister of Labour Liisa Jaakonsaari believes that Reini no longer enjoys the confidence and respect needed to discharge the duties of the state labour mediator," the ministry said.
The civil servants' act requires that a civil servant must behave in accordance with his status and duties, it said.
